entry.name: AcquireTile
entry.value: Acquire Tile

entry.name: AcquireTileDescription
entry.value: Before constructing more buildings, you have to claim new tiles. Click “<icon height='20' texture='Icons/Actions/AcquireTile'/><nbsp/>Acquire Tile” and <icon height='20' texture='Icons/LeftMouseButton'/><nbsp/>select a tile with 1 or more <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/BuildingSlots'/><nbsp/>building slots.

entry.name: AllianceVictory
entry.value: Alliance Victory

entry.name: AllianceVictoryDescription
entry.value: You are allied with everyone, but to achieve victory they must also be allied with each other.

entry.name: BleedDescription
entry.value: <icon height='20' color='GUI/Red' texture='Icons/Features/Bleed'/><nbsp/>Bleed damages ground units each turn. Don't stay inside for too long.

entry.name: CameraDescription
entry.value: Welcome to post-apocalyptic Earth. To move the camera, <icon height='20' texture='Icons/LeftMouseButton'/><nbsp/>press over terrain and move your mouse.

entry.name: CloseQuartersFire
entry.value: Close-Quarters Fire

entry.name: CloseQuartersFireDescription
entry.value: Militants have a weapon with <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Traits/CloseQuartersFire'/><nbsp/>Close-Quarters Fire and attack at double rate at range 1. Consider your position before attacking.

entry.name: ConstructInfantryBuilding
entry.value: Construct Barracks

entry.name: ConstructInfantryBuildingDescription
entry.value: Construct unit production buildings to reinforce your struggling presence. Click “<icon height='20' texture='Icons/Buildings/HumanInfantry'/><nbsp/>Barracks” and <icon height='20' texture='Icons/LeftMouseButton'/><nbsp/>select a valid tile to start construction there.

entry.name: CoverDescription
entry.value: <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Features/Forest'/><nbsp/>Forests, <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Features/Ruins'/><nbsp/>ruins, <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Traits/Outpost'/><nbsp/>outposts and <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Features/City'/><nbsp/>cities grant ranged damage reduction for non-large units. Take cover when you can.

entry.name: EquipItem
entry.value: Equip Item

entry.name: EquipItemDescription
entry.value: <icon height='20' texture='Icons/RightMouseButton'/><nbsp/>click an item to equip it on your hero. Newly equipped items go on a 1 turn cooldown before being usable.

entry.name: FoundCity
entry.value: Found City

entry.name: FoundCityDescription
entry.value: To found your first city, click “<icon height='20' texture='Icons/Actions/FoundCity'/><nbsp/>Found City” and <icon height='20' texture='Icons/LeftMouseButton'/><nbsp/>select a tile.

entry.name: HabitationBlocks
entry.value: Habitation Blocks

entry.name: HabitationBlocksDescription
entry.value: Each building except the headquarters requires 1 <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Population'/><nbsp/>population to operate. It's critical to research and construct <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Buildings/PopulationLimit'/><nbsp/>Habitation Blocks to increase your city's <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/PopulationLimit'/><nbsp/>housing (population limit).

entry.name: HealingDescription
entry.value: The unit has taken significant damage. To heal, it must stay still and not participate in combat. Click “<icon height='20' texture='Icons/Actions/HoldPositionUntilHealed'/><nbsp/>Hold Position Until Healed” to wait until it is back at full strength. Consider retreating to a friendly outpost or city tile where healing is accelerated.

entry.name: HousingDescription
entry.value: The city's <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/PopulationLimit'/><nbsp/>housing is full. Construct <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Buildings/PopulationLimit'/><nbsp/>Habitation Blocks to increase the amount of living space and allow your population to grow again.

entry.name: LoyaltyDescription
entry.value: Negative loyalty is decreasing the city's resource output. Research and construct a <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Buildings/Loyalty'/><nbsp/>Holo Theater to keep your population working effectively.

entry.name: MarkTiles
entry.value: Mark Tiles

entry.name: MarkTilesDescription
entry.value: <string name='Tips/Loading/54'/>

entry.name: MoraleDescription
entry.value: The unit has taken a hit to <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Morale'/><nbsp/>morale from the loss of nearby allies. This will reduce their performance in combat. To recover, keep them out of combat or kill enemy units.

entry.name: MovementDescription
entry.value: Move the unit by pressing <icon height='20' texture='Icons/RightMouseButton'/>. Each unit can only move once per turn.

entry.name: NPCsDescription
entry.value: Three non-player leaders are also fighting for supremacy: <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Factions/Anchorite'/><nbsp/>Anchorite, <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Factions/Chieftess'/><nbsp/>Chieftess and <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Factions/Zephon'/><nbsp/>ZEPHON. Peace with them allows you to ask for their support. Good standing may unlock additional choices in quests.

entry.name: PopulationDescription
entry.value: The city does not have enough <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Population'/><nbsp/>population to operate all buildings at full efficiency. You can click <icon height='20' texture='Icons/DisableBuilding'/> to disable a building.

entry.name: ProduceUnits
entry.value: Produce Units

entry.name: ProduceUnitsDescription
entry.value: Start <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Units/Militant'/><nbsp/>Militant production in the Barracks. Other buildings can keep producing at the same time. If you construct more Barracks, units will finish training faster.

entry.name: ReconDescription
entry.value: Many units have activatable abilities. Outriders can reveal their surroundings with the <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Actions/Recon'/><nbsp/>Recon ability.

entry.name: ResearchDescription
entry.value: Researching a hero is a good place to start. You'll be able to produce them in the headquarters.

entry.name: TheConcordat
entry.value: The Concordat

entry.name: TheConcordatDescription
entry.value: You can buy and sell resources and hero items at any time at <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Shop'/><nbsp/>The Concordat.

entry.name: TransportsDescription
entry.value: Transports can carry non-large units as cargo. To embark, <icon height='20' texture='Icons/RightMouseButton'/><nbsp/>move onto the transport's tile. Embarked units heal inside, but if the transport is destroyed, the cargo dies with it.

entry.name: SelectionDescription
entry.value: <icon height='20' texture='Icons/LeftMouseButton'/><nbsp/>click on a unit to select it.

entry.name: WinningDescription
entry.value: To win, defeat all players or unite everyone under one alliance.
